articles.title: What Could Go Wrong?! 48500-Year-Old Siberian Virus is Revived - Ancient Origins

articles.title: Humans and octopuses descended from SAME animal that lived 518 million years ago - Daily Mail
articles.description: Octopuses have a large variety of gene regulators in their bran that is similar to the human brain. Experts say it is because they both descended from the same primitive worm-like animal.
articles.content:
Octopuses and humans descended from the same primitive worm-like animal that lived 518 million years ago, and this could be why the eight-limbed creatures are highly intelligent.
